item.title: Colorectal Cancer Prevention
item.dc:creator: André Oliveira
item.description:
When detected in early stages, colorectal cancer is a disease with a high cure rate.

The post Colorectal Cancer Prevention first appeared on Aqualab.
item.content:encoded:
Approximately 500,000 people die each year from colorectal cancer worldwide, making this cancer the second leading cause of cancer deaths. However, when detected in early stages, colorectal cancer is a disease with a high cure rate. For this reason, from the age of 50 you should consider colorectal cancer surveillance as an integral part of regular monitoring of your health status.

The innovative Oncolaert test is able to detect the presence in the plasma of a marker that is characteristic of colorectal cancer. For this purpose, it will only be necessary to collect a blood sample that will further be sent to the Infogene laboratory for analysis.

Within about two weeks, you will receive your result. If the marker is detected in your blood sample it means that there is an increased chance for a colorectal cancer diagnosis, in which case you should undergo a colonoscopy for confirmation and start treatment.

The post Colorectal Cancer Prevention first appeared on Aqualab.

item.title: Panorama™ — Prenatal Test
item.dc:creator: kobuadmin
item.description:
AQUALAB informs all moms that we have at their disposal the Prenatal Non-Invasive Testing of maternal blood: the Panorama™ — Prenatal Test. […]

The post Panorama™ — Prenatal Test first appeared on Aqualab.
item.content:encoded:
AQUALAB informs all moms that we have at their disposal the Prenatal Non-Invasive Testing of maternal blood: the Panorama — Prenatal Test.

  • One of kind in detection starting at 9 weeks of gestation;
  • One of kind in detecting cases of Triploidy;
  • One of kind in detecting “vanishing twins”;
  • CARIOCHIP’s offer, in case of a high-risk result.

For more detailed information, consult the article Panorama — Prenatal Test.

The post Panorama™ — Prenatal Test first appeared on Aqualab.

item.title: AQUALAB – SME of Excellence
item.dc:creator: kobuadmin
item.description:
AQUALAB was awarded the 2014 SME of Excellence. This recognition, awarded by IAPMEI, rewards the Company's outstanding performance during the year.

The post AQUALAB – SME of Excellence first appeared on Aqualab.
item.content:encoded:
It is with great satisfaction that we announce that the AQUALAB Clinical and Public Health Laboratory was awarded the 2014 SME of Excellence. This recognition, awarded by IAPMEI, rewards the Company’s outstanding performance during the year.

We consider it a privilege to be recognized with an SME of Excellence. We believe that this award is the result of continuous work developed over the last few years by a highly qualified and experienced team, who deserves the credit of having led the AQUALAB name to a level of Excellency.

This distinction was also possible thanks to the confidence and contribution of all our users, clients, partners and suppliers.

The SME of Excellence reinforces the status of leading PME that AQUALAB has consecutively received since 2011.

The post AQUALAB – SME of Excellence first appeared on Aqualab.
